itunes:author: iBooks
title: Erik Larson: Meet the Author
itunes:subtitle: The master of thrilling nonfiction discusses his book on pre-WWII Germany.
itunes:summary: Sometimes the best way to tell a story about something vast and far reaching is to focus instead on the microcosm. And so it goes with Erik Larson’s "In the Garden of Beasts: Love, Terror, and an American Family in Hitler's Berlin." A book of nonfiction that resembles good fiction, Larson’s latest work looks at Berlin in the 1930s and explores why the world didn’t recognize the Nazi threat until too late.
itunes:keywords: Erik Larson, in the garden of beasts, WWII, world war two, nazis, devil in the white city, erik larsen, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
